lastRelease.name: Release-24
lastRelease.description: Triggered by Repository: Microsoft.VisualStudio.Services.ReleaseManagement.Server.Plugins.Model.GitRepository, Branch: refs/heads/master, Commit Id: 62.

workflowTasks.name: Copying Secure Files To Project Directory
Inspect Files & Run Packer Validate and Inspect

inputs.script:
cd _Terraform_IaaC_Classic
pwd
ls -al
packer validate -var-file packer-vars.json packer.json
packer inspect -var-file packer-vars.json packer.json

workflowTasks.name: Copying Secure Files To Project Directory

inputs.script:
cd _Terraform_IaaC_Classic
pwd
ls -al
#packer build -var-file packer-vars.json packer.json

workflowTasks.name: Copying Secure Files To Project Directory

inputs.script:
cd _Terraform_IaaC_Classic
pwd
ls -al
terraform init -backend-config=backend.json
terraform workspace select dev || terraform workspace new dev
terraform workspace select prod || terraform workspace new prod
terraform workspace select test || terraform workspace new test
terraform workspace list

workflowTasks.name: Copying Secure Files To Project Directory

inputs.script:
cd _Terraform_IaaC_Classic
pwd
ls -al
export TF_INPUT=0
terraform init -backend-config=backend.json
terraform workspace list
terraform workspace select dev
terraform plan --var-file dev.tfvars  -var="env=Dev" -var="Megastar=$(Megastar)" -var="Superstar=$(Superstar)" -var="YoungTiger=$(YoungTiger)"

workflowTasks.name: Copying Secure Files To Project Directory

inputs.script:
cd _Terraform_IaaC_Classic
pwd
ls -al
export TF_INPUT=0
terraform init -backend-config=backend.json
terraform workspace list
terraform workspace select dev
terraform apply --var-file dev.tfvars  -var="env=Dev" -var="Megastar=$(Megastar)" -var="Superstar=$(Superstar)" -var="YoungTiger=$(YoungTiger)" --auto-approve
